tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to cross-site scripting when custom SVGs are provided via path properties in the Illustration component, allowing malicious scripts to be injected and executed due to insufficient input validation.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@salesforce/design-system-react` library to the patch version.
